description.displayText: Cece was a perfect fit for our family. She is punctual, communicative, easy going, and loved our babies the moment she met them. Cece was our part time nanny for our 6 month old twins and we immediately felt comfortable and confident with her care-taking style. She was also super helpful with sticking to our schedules and helped keep up with baby related chores. Would 100% welcome her back into our home anytime!
description.originalText: Cece was a perfect fit for our family. She is punctual, communicative, easy going, and loved our babies the moment she met them. Cece was our part time nanny for our 6 month old twins and we immediately felt comfortable and confident with her care-taking style. She was also super helpful with sticking to our schedules and helped keep up with baby related chores. Would 100% welcome her back into our home anytime!

description.displayText: We were so SO lucky to find Cece! She's been with us for 10 months and if we could keep her forever, we would! Our child started preschool so that's the only reason why we don't need her full time anymore. Our hearts are so sad as she was very well part of our family & our son absolutely LOVED her. She followed our schedule, helped with everything we needed & went out of her way to do activities with him and was always there if we needed extra help! If you're looking for someone who is going to love your child like her own, she's most definitely your girl!
